headline: Palantir Bounced Back From Sell-Offs Today -- Is the Stock a Buy Right Now?
summary: Palantir Technologies stock managed to climb 2% today despite initially seeing big sell-offs on first-quarter GDP data.  Palantir's extremely growth-dependent valuation is too risky for most investors, but the company is playing a leading role in the artificial intelligence (AI) revolution.  Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) stock ended Wednesday's trading in the green despite opening with a substantial valuation pullback.

headline: 6 of the best stocks from Trump's first 100 days — and 3 of the worst
summary: The first 100 days of the Trump administration unleashed economic chaos throughout the U.S. economy, including the stock market, which saw the worst first 100 days of a presidency since Nixon. Still, there were winners (and losers) among the S&P 500.

headline: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) Partners With Natilus to Innovate Sustainable Aircraft Development
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) has experienced a notable price move of 46% over the last quarter, partly coinciding with the announcement of a strategic partnership with Natilus to bolster sustainable aircraft production using AI technologies. This collaboration emphasizes the company's proactive stance in embracing innovative solutions and sustainability initiatives. headline: Better Artificial Intelligence Stock: Palantir vs. SoundHound AI
summary: Palantir is seeing strong commercial customer growth, and just won a large contract with NATO.  Two companies showing some of the most promise on this front are Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) and SoundHound AI (NASDAQ: SOUN).  While both Palantir and SoundHound are emerging AI software companies, their businesses are quite different.

headline: Commercial Deal Flow Hits ‘All-Time High’ at Palantir Technologies (PLTR)
summary: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) has emerged as a polarizing yet undeniable force in the rapidly evolving world of artificial intelligence (AI) and data analytics. Shares are up 402% over the past year, riding a trend of explosive revenue and free cash flow growth acceleration. In fact, PLTR’s commercial deal pipeline is now gushing at the highest level in the company’s history. headline: Can Artificial Intelligence (AI) Leader Palantir Technologies Continue to Grow Despite Trump's Tariffs?
summary: Shifting trade policy could impact Palantir Technologies, but, given the nature of its business model, the impact should be low.  Let's look at one of the leaders in the artificial intelligence (AI) sector, Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR), to see whether this high-flying stock can continue to soar in the face of tariffs.  More often than not, fee collection occurs in imported goods rather than exports.
